Name: Abridged
About the game: Abridged is a strategy board game where the goal is to connect to any two opposite edges of the 8x8 board by placing pieces to form a continuous bridge. The strategy lies in the fact that you can place pieces over your opponent's to block their pathways. You have a limited number of pieces that have their own strengths and weaknesses, so you must plan ahead and build reactively to your opponent. You can either play online via Steam invite or locally on one computer.
